meta_config.description: Exquisite 3D isometry in Glassmorphism and Soft Claymorphism

objective.goal: Create a 3D isometric image in Glassmorphism and Soft Claymorphism styles.

reference_image.label: Image Extraction
reference_image.description: Upload a photo of the object.
reference_image.extraction_instruction: Analyze the uploaded image. Identify food ingredients vs non-food items. Keep food photo-realistic but slightly vary/refine their shape and arrangement (do not copy exactly). Apply Glassmorphism styles ONLY to non-food items (bowls, tools).

subject.placement_rule: Render food/ingredients with photo-realistic textures but slightly modified forms/arrangement (do not replicate uploaded image exactly). Apply Glassmorphism styling ONLY to non-food items. Do NOT apply glass filters to food.

must_include: Subtle white inner glow to simulate glass edges
Soft rounded corners with Apple-style squircles
must_not_include: Legible text or characters (use abstract shapes only)

fixed_profile.style: Exquisite 3D isometry (45 deg angle) in Glassmorphism and Soft Claymorphism.
materials_layers_geometry: Frosted glass with strong background blur (Non-food items only)
Subtle white inner glow to simulate glass edges (Non-food items only)
Soft rounded corners with Apple-style squircles
Food/Ingredients: Hyper-realistic textures with slight shape variations (No glass effect)
fixed_profile.ui: None. Pure composition without floating panels or dashboards.
fixed_profile.surroundings: Highly detailed refined surface reflections on glass. Abstract and minimal translucent glass objects.
